DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare effect music therapy v music therapy depression anxiety patient hematologic malignancy undergo high-dose therapy autologous stem cell transplantation . - Compare effect regimens mood , mucositis pain , pain interference , need analgesic medication , length hospital stay patient . - Compare immediate effect regimen mood patient . OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients stratify accord whole body whole lymphatic irradiation ( yes v ) diagnosis ( non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma v Hodgkin 's lymphoma v myeloma/amyloidosis ) . Patients randomize one two arm . - Arm I : Patients receive individualized music therapy 20-30 minute begin day 0 continue 16 day maximum 12 session high-dose therapy autologous stem cell transplantation . Patients complete Profile Mood States ( POMS ) quality life pain questionnaire day -2 , 0 , 1 , 4 , 7 , 10 , 13 , 16 . - Arm II : Patients receive standard psychosocial support high-dose therapy autologous stem cell transplantation . Patients complete POMS mucositis pain questionnaire arm I . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 80 patient ( 40 per arm ) accrue study .
